ACCOUNT_ACTIVE_INFO: Your customer can receive your training plans via email and the training app.
ACCOUNT_INACTIVE_INFO: Your customer can currently neither receive plans by email nor via the training app. Would you like to send him an activation email?
EMAIL_INVALID_MESSAGE: The email address is incorrect. Please correct the email address in consultation with the customer.
DATA_PRIVACY_ON_CONTRACT: The customer has already signed the consent to data storage manually on paper. No digital document is saved.
DATA_PRIVACY_ON_DIGITAL: The customer has already signed the consent to data storage.
DATA_PRIVACY_WARNING: The customer has not yet signed any consent to data storage. In accordance with the data protection regulation, please now ask the customer to sign the consent before sensitive health data is recorded. Otherwise the storage is illegal.
IS_DRAG_IMAGE_INACTIVE: Drag 'n' drop the image here, or click to select a file
DELETE_CUSTOMER_TEXT: Do you really want to delete the customer?
